description.const: New or modified boundary fence or wall
Creation of a new access (eg a dropped kerb)
Chimney flue or soil and vent pipes
Creation of driveway or laying of hardstanding
Works to a dangerous or dead tree
New or modified outbuilding (eg garage or shed)

CalculateMetadata.description: Metadata associated with PlanX Calculate components used to determine fees throughout a service

Complainant.description: Contact details for the complainant filing the enforcement report
Complainant.title: Complainant

DateTime.description: Regex-based implementation of iso-date-time until available in ajv-formats@3.0.0

Enhancements.description: Metadata associated with any AI-enhanced components used throughout this service

Feature<Geometry,GeoJsonProperties>.description: A feature object which contains a geometry and associated properties. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.2

bbox.description: Bounding box of the coordinate range of the object's Geometries, Features, or Feature Collections. The value of the bbox member is an array of length 2*n where n is the number of dimensions represented in the contained geometries, with all axes of the most southwesterly point followed by all axes of the more northeasterly point. The axes order of a bbox follows the axes order of geometries. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-5

id.description: A value that uniquely identifies this feature in a https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.2.

type.description: Specifies the type of GeoJSON object.

bbox.description: Bounding box of the coordinate range of the object's Geometries, Features, or Feature Collections. The value of the bbox member is an array of length 2*n where n is the number of dimensions represented in the contained geometries, with all axes of the most southwesterly point followed by all axes of the more northeasterly point. The axes order of a bbox follows the axes order of geometries. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-5

type.description: Specifies the type of GeoJSON object.

FeeExplanation.description: An explanation, including policy references, of the fees associated with this application

category.description: Breakdown of calculated fee by category of development, based on the scales defined in The Town and Country Planning Regulations https://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2012/2920/schedule/1/part/2

FeeExplanationNotApplicable.description: An indicator that an application fee does not apply to this application type or journey, therefore there is not an explanation of how it was calculated

File.description: File uploaded and labeled by the user to support the application

number.description: User-assigned unique drawing number, if applicable

description.const: Details of impact on access, roads, and rights of way
Evidence for application fee exemption - disability
Scheme for mitigation and monitoring of emissions (dust, odour and vibrations)
Plans showing the stretches of hedgerows to be removed
Evidence of the date of planting of the removed hedgerows
Details of litter, vermin and bird control
Information the authority considers necessary for the application
Information the applicant considers relevant to the application
Details of storage treatment or disposal of waste
Removed or pruned trees and hedges

Public / Village Hall / Other Community Facility
Church Hall / Religious Meeting Place / Hall
Preparatory / First / Primary / Infant / Junior / Middle School
Boarding / Guest House / Bed And Breakfast / Youth Hostel
Holiday Let/Accomodation/Short-Term Let Other Than CH01
Industrial Applicable to manufacturing, engineering, maintenance, storage / wholesale distribution and extraction sites
Coke works and other coal carbonisation plants
Leisure - Applicable to recreational sites and enterprises
Bingo Hall / Cinema / Conference / Exhibition Centre / Theatre / Concert Hall

Barber / Hairdresser / Beauty Salon / Tattoo Parlour
Airfield / Airstrip / Airport / Air Transport Infrastructure Facility
Car / Coach / Commercial Vehicle / Taxi Parking / Park And Ride Site

PropertyType.description: Property types derived from Basic Land and Property Unit (BLPU) classification codes

ProposedAddress.description: Address information for sites without a known Unique Property Reference Number (UPRN)

x.description: Easting coordinate in British National Grid (OSGB36)

y.description: Northing coordinate in British National Grid (OSGB36)

ProposedAddress.title: Proposed site address

Region.description: The region in England that contains this address sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/region, where 'London' is a proxy for the Greater London Authority (GLA) area
Region.title: Region

RequestedFiles.description: File types requested by this service. Schema["files"] will be a subset of this list based on the user's journey through the service

Responses.description: The ordered list of questions, answers, and their metadata for the application

description: The root specification for an enforcement report in England generated by a digital planning service

boundary.description: HM Land Registry Index polygon for this property, commonly referred to as the blue line boundary, sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/title-boundary

developmentCorporations.description: Current and historic development corporations that contain this address sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/development-corporation-boundary

localAuthorityDistrict.description: Current and historic UK Local Authority Districts (LAD) that contain this address sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/local-authority-district

localPlanningAuthority.description: Current and historic UK Local Planning Authorities (LPA) that contain this address sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/local-planning-authority

region.description: Name of the region sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/region; "London" is a proxy for the Greater London Authority

ward.description: Name of the ward sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/ward

boundary.description: Boundary of the enforcement breach if provided digitally

date.description: Start and end date of the enforcement breach if applicable; ongoing breaches will not have an end date

title: Enforcement
